about_the_game:
Hazardous Hunt – Face Those Who Betray Your Trust!

In a mysterious laboratory, can you truly trust your friends? Hazardous Hunt is a social deduction game where betrayal, strategy, and tension reach their peak. Your goal is simple: survive with your team and uncover the traitors. But remember, there’s an impostor among you...

Key Features:

🛠️ Varied Roles:
Each game offers a unique experience with different roles:

  • Troublemaker: Distract suspicion by throwing paint and misdirecting the group.

  • Crewmate: Complete tasks and lead your team to victory.

  • Techman: Follow the impostor’s footsteps and gather clues.

  • Scientist: Use your tablet to detect dead players and share critical information.

  • Stalker: Track your target and report their moves.

  • Impostor: Deceive everyone and eliminate your way to victory.

🌫️ A Thrilling Atmosphere:
Hazardous gas leaks, malfunctioning equipment, and dark corners... even the laboratory itself is an enemy.

🤝 Play with Friends:
Strategize, accuse, and figure out who deserves your trust. Guessing the impostor has never been this challenging!

🎮 Dynamic Gameplay:
Every match tells a new story with unpredictable outcomes. The winning side is always a surprise.

Hazardous Hunt challenges your strategy and communication skills, opening the doors to a thrilling social experiment. Choose who to trust… or trust only yourself. 👀

Are you ready to uncover the secrets of the laboratory? Join us now and let the hunt begin! 🧪
